channel.title: Nerd Wars!!!
channel.copyright: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons License - Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike - http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.0/
channel.description: Fantasy nerd battles, where in we pit characters from across the nerd universe in direct mortal combat (oddly there are none from Mortal Kombat). The shows will feature Toadpuc and Fereshte fighting over who should win. However since there is a small chance of the two agreeing with each other over a particular battle, and a huge chance of the podcast disintegrating into broken bones and hurt feelings we welcome people to call in. callers votes will count as high as the votes of Toadpuc and Fereshte, while people texting on the boards points will be adopted (stolen) by the host currently supporting that side. We plan to do 4 fights a show, for the first round at least, unless fights go quickly. If you listen to the recorded version and something we say doesnt jive with you email us @ nerdkombat@gmail.com before the next scheduled show, and we will address it on the next show. We also understand that some characters such as Robin were different people at different times, before the first battle with those characters we will establish which one we are using and stick with it till they die. This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com
channel.itunes:author: Fereshte
channel.itunes:subtitle: Nerd Wars!!!
channel.itunes:summary: Fantasy nerd battles, where in we pit characters from across the nerd universe in direct mortal combat (oddly there are none from Mortal Kombat). The shows will feature Toadpuc and Fereshte fighting over who should win. However since there is a small chance of the two agreeing with each other over a particular battle, and a huge chance of the podcast disintegrating into broken bones and hurt feelings we welcome people to call in. callers votes will count as high as the votes of Toadpuc and Fereshte, while people texting on the boards points will be adopted (stolen) by the host currently supporting that side. We plan to do 4 fights a show, for the first round at least, unless fights go quickly. If you listen to the recorded version and something we say doesnt jive with you email us @ nerdkombat@gmail.com before the next scheduled show, and we will address it on the next show. We also understand that some characters such as Robin were different people at different times, before the first battle with those characters we will establish which one we are using and stick with it till they die. This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com
channel.itunes:keywords: Anime, Fantasy, Star Wars, cartoons, Marvel, DC, video games, nerd, nerdlyness.
